body.name: Spytec GPS GL300 Mini GPS Tracker for Vehicles, Cars, Trucks, Loved Ones, Fleets, Hidden Tracker Device for Vehicles with Weatherproof Magnetic Case, Unlimited US and Worldwide Real-Time Tracking App

features: PORTABLE TRACKING DEVICE: Our mini gps tracker has a compact design, making it ideal to be used as an anti theft car device, or used as a tracker for kids, trucks, vehicles or other assets like boats or RVs in storage.

4G SUPER SIM COVERAGE: Covering all of North America, and worldwide, you have full coverage with our car gps tracker. Capable of tracking from anywhere in the world, an actual tracking device for cars is superior as an AirTag alternative. Available on iOS and Android the app lets you track in real-time from anywhere in the world - regardless of where your vehicle tracker device is.

WEATHERPROOF MAGNETIC VEHICLE FINDER: The sturdy M2 case is made with durable ABS plastics and designed specifically to keep your Gl300 mini tracker safe from the elements, keeping it firmly attached to vehicles while continuing to record in any situations. The GL300 can be used on trucks and motorcycles and can also be used as a fleet GPS tracker.

REAL TIME GPS TRACKER FOR VEHICLES: Whether you need a tracking device for kids, or car trackers for your vehicle our mini GPS tracker and the supporting app will let you keep track in real-time. Get alerts when the tracker enters or leaves a specific boundary area (geo-fencing) or get speed notifications if your teen driver is traveling too fast. Use the Time Machine feature to also review history and see where a tracker was, where it moved, and what was around it at any given point.

THIS DEVICE REQUIRES A SUBSCRIPTION to our easy-to-use mobile and desktop apps. Activate the device, choose your plan, and start tracking. Subscriptions start at $22.95/month(USD) annually or $29.95/month(USD) with a 3 month prepaid plan. Get free 24/7 support and a lifetime warranty on GPS trackers with an active annual subscription. Worldwide coverage - update Network Mode in app before leaving the country.

Does this work in other countries? The trackers have coverage in 185 countries, including the United States and Canada, with no additional costs for international usage. If traveling outside the US and Canada, simply update the tracker’s network mode to international within the app. Is there a subscription? Our GPS Trackers, like phones, need a subscription for network connectivity. Activate yours by scanning the QR code on the package. Enjoy updates every 5 seconds and unlimited cellular data at no extra cost. Does this product come with a sim card? All our trackers are pre-equipped with a SIM card. To activate and ready the tracker for use, simply scan the QR code on the packaging and activate your subscription. Is there a contract to use the service? Using our trackers doesn't require a contract. We offer a monthly pay-as-you-go plan, with the option to pay annually, saving up to 50% off the monthly price. Which GPS tracker app do I download on my device? To download the app for your tracker, search for ‘Hapn GPS’ in the Apple App Store or Google Play store. Tracking is also available via a web browser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spytec GPS GL300 working great for my Motorcycle!
reviews.reviewText: I just purchased the unit from Amazon a couple of weeks ago, I use it so my wife can track my movements when I take my motorcycle for a ride. With the colder weather limiting my time out, I've only tested it a few times so far, but very happy with the accuracy and the battery life. I've had mine on the performance mode (the fastest when moving at 5 sec pings) and it's done very well for me. I will update this at some point when I've tested it more, but overall the unit was priced well on Amazon, but keep in mind you do need to purchase a monthly or yearly subscription to begin tracking with the device. For me, the cost is worth the peace of mind my wife has so she can keep an eye out for me on those long rides and hopefully I'll never need it to find me if something bad should happen but at least it gives her the knowledge of where I am and where I've been. The magnet is SUPER strong so no worries there, but it even has 2 areas where you can apply a zip tie as a backup if you like. I haven't tested it out in very dense areas yet where cell phone reception is limited, but again, will update when I can test all aspects of the unit. Can't say anything with regard to tech support either since I've had no problems thus far. In any case, if what I've said is in any way helpful to you, and you are looking for a good tracker for whatever reason, I can highly recommend this one! Thanks, fellow riders be safe out there! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is amazing. Easy set up, great accuracy. I know it has a subscription, but well worth the expense. Product support was great, asked if it needed a SIM card, a response in 3 hours. WOW

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it! I've purchased several different GPS trackers and this one does the best. It's affordable, accurate, and durable. Case keeps it completely protected. No issues yet. Does exactly what it's supposed to. Highly Recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great GPS tracker, but the subscription is a little expensive.
reviews.reviewText: As someone who is always on the go and needs to keep track of my belongings, I decided to try out the Spytec GPS GL300.Pros:Accurate location tracking: I was impressed with how accurately the Spytec GPS GL300 tracked my belongings. I could easily locate them in real-time and see their exact location on the map.Easy to use: The Spytec GPS GL300 was easy to set up and use. I simply had to download the app and connect the device to my phone. The app was user-friendly, and I could customize the settings to suit my needs.Compact and discreet: The Spytec GPS GL300 is compact and discreet, which makes it easy to hide and track my belongings without anyone noticing. It was perfect for tracking my car, bike, or even my luggage when traveling.Long battery life: The battery life of the Spytec GPS GL300 was impressive. It lasted for several days on a single charge, which meant I didn't have to worry about recharging it often.Cons:Subscription fee: To use the Spytec GPS GL300, you have to pay a subscription fee. While it's not expensive, it may be a drawback for some people who are on a tight budget. ($32.61 a month)Limited features: The Spytec GPS GL300 has limited features compared to other GPS trackers. It's great for tracking the location of your belongings, but it doesn't have additional features such as geofencing or alerts.Can be slow to update: Sometimes, the Spytec GPS GL300 can be slow to update its location, especially when it's in areas with poor network coverage.Requires a data connection: The Spytec GPS GL300 requires a data connection to work, which may be a drawback if you're in an area with poor network coverage or don't have access to data.Overall, I would recommend the Spytec GPS GL300 to anyone who needs a reliable and discreet GPS tracker for their belongings. Its accurate location tracking, ease of use, long battery life, and compact design make it a great option. However, its subscription fee, limited features, and reliance on a data connection may be a drawback for some users.

reviews.reviewerName: I’m a detailer. I use steam pretty regularly. McCuloch makes great budget steamers. That being said, the model priced below this one, the cheaper model, is actually better. The fittings fit more securely. The steam functions exactly the same, only this model has a (useless) pressure reading and useless “how much steam do you want” dial… you always want full steam… so..
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good hardware software medium price for service
reviews.reviewText: The device and its software are GREAT. Intuitive… and peace of mind. Price for service not too bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I own 6 of these now. They work well. The app is easy to use but has some kink that need to be worked out. Not a lot though which is why I own so many. I own a lot of vehicles. The peace of mind for having these trackers is priceless.They take awhile to charge the first time but after that depending on what mode you have then on they can last for weeks. I strongly recommend you buy the magnet case with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's actually a fantastic tool and if have teens will give you a peace of mind
reviews.reviewText: I was worried about my area not having good reception but it worked perfect. I'm a computer boomer and it was super simple to set up and use. The app makes everything easy and the product works amazing. Place under the steering wheel well and the magnetic box is rock solid, makes no noise. The battery lasts about a week or so, the app has satellite view which is helpful customer service is A+ but the only complaint I have is they don't make it clear that they keep charging your card every month until you contact them and ask them to stop. But once emailed they turned off. Son has permit and it's all ready for when he gets his license. I've seen a case recently where a young teen was found like a week later in a lake and if her parents had a tracker hidden in her car, they would of known exactly where the car was. Can't put a price on this item and their service. Plus even for the safety of mind of your vehicle, especially if you have a classic car or 80s-90s JDM car that's an easy target for thieves. They even make a hard wire kit to go to your battery or you can buy one that goes under your hood. This is much better than one that goes in OBD2 port as thieves will immediately know that's there and throw it. Can hide in trunk, under seat, I can't say enough great things about this service and product and their customer service.

Es verdad que necesitas hacer un pago pero vale la pena por seguridad y uso personal, funciona incluso en zonas remotas donde nisiquiera la red de la compañía celular es estable, en cambio el GPS es tan exacto. Lo amo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Took me 5min to setup in quebec area
reviews.reviewText: Built quality it only cost 20$ canadian for 1 month and it easy to setup,dont listen the review that said its hard,they probably just start learing how to open a computer

A entrega foi positiva, mas a configuração do equipamento torna-se difícil... devido a falta de comunicação e orientação com o cliente, a linguagem restrita ao inglês... em nossa atualidade coisas restritas é um atraso... E para somar não é muito preciso, demora alguns segundos para atualizar o local, também descarrega rápido. Mas a cobrança sempre em dia.
The ad said it would last for 2 weeks.

reviews.reviewerName: This product was amazing. Was easy installing and would highly recommend
reviews.reviewText: I installed these on my work trucks. Usually they get all dirty and with the protective case it worked perfectly. Bought 5 more
